issue.title: [JS] Commit package-lock.json and/or yarn.lock
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2772](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2772). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should commit one (or both) of these lockfiles to the repo to make the dependency tree explicit and consistent.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2772?focusedCommentId=16624715) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
